title: Textile, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
description: Garden scene with a man and a woman standing in the center. He is holding a branch of grape vine in his left had and in the other, a bunch of grapes. A boy stands with a hat in his hand and a cane. Two dogs on the other side. In the background, a fence, trees, shrubs and a waterfall. Printed in brown on a white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 18th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave. 1945-4-1.
